name: Mondelez International, Inc.
description: Mondelez International, Inc. is a global leader in the snacking industry, committed to creating delicious moments of joy for consumers around the world. Founded in 2012 as a spin-off from Kraft Foods, Mondelez offers a diverse portfolio of iconic brands, including Oreo, Cadbury, Toblerone, Triscuit, and belVita. The company operates in more than 150 countries and has a strong presence in both developed and emerging markets. Mondelez is dedicated to sustainability and responsible sourcing, focusing on reducing its environmental impact and improving the livelihoods of farmers and communities in its supply chain. Through its 'Snacking Made Right' initiative, Mondelez aims to enhance the nutritional profile of its products while maintaining great taste and quality. The company invests heavily in innovation and marketing to adapt to changing consumer preferences, including a growing demand for healthier snacks and sustainable practices. Mondelez's commitment to community engagement and social responsibility is evident in its various programs aimed at promoting education, wellness, and environmental stewardship globally.

faq.answer: Dirk Van de Put is the CEO of Mondelez International, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Mondelez headquartered?
faq.answer: Mondelez is headquartered in Chicago, Illinois, USA.

faq.answer: Mondelez's main products include Oreo, Cadbury, Toblerone, and Triscuit.
